languages.text: "Трибунал выслушал достаточно доказательств, и, я надеюсь, ни у кого не осталось сомнений в виновности династии фон Валанциус. Однако давайте же позволим Вольному Торговцу сказать последнее слово — нам всем любопытно узнать, что же вы вынесли из этого допроса".

traits.locale_text: "Трибунал выслушал достаточно доказательств, и, я надеюсь, ни у кого не осталось сомнений в виновности династии фон Валанциус. Однако давайте же позволим Вольному Торговцу сказать последнее слово — нам всем любопытно узнать, что же вы вынесли из этого допроса".

languages.text: "The court has been presented with enough evidence, and I hope no one is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty. But let us allow the Rogue Trader to say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this enquiry."
languages.original_text: "Трибунал выслушал достаточно доказательств, и, я надеюсь, ни у кого не осталось сомнений в виновности династии фон Валанциус. Однако давайте же позволим Вольному Торговцу сказать последнее слово — нам всем любопытно узнать, что же вы вынесли из этого допроса".

traits.locale_text: "The court was presented with enough evidence, and I hope nobody is harbouring any doubts about the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty. But let us allow the Rogue Trader say {mf|his|her} final word — we are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this inquiry."

"The court was presented with enough evidence, and I hope nobody is harbouring any doubts about the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty. But let us allow the Rogue Trader say {mf|his|her} final word — we are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this inquiry."

"The court was presented with enough evidence and I hope nobody is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty. But let us allow the Rogue Trader say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this inquiry."

"The court was presented with enough evidence and I hope nobody is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty. But let us allow the Rogue Trader say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this inquiry."

"The court has been presented with enough evidence, and I hope no one is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty. But let us allow the Rogue Trader to say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this inquiry."

"The court has been presented with enough evidence, and I hope no one is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty. But let us allow the Rogue Trader to say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this enquiry."

languages.text: « La cour a accumulé suffisamment de preuves et j'ose espérer que plus personne ne doute de la culpabilité de la dynastie von Valancius. Mais laissons {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} le mot de la fin. Nous sommes tous curieux de connaître les enseignements que vous avez tirés de cette enquête. »
languages.original_text: "The court has been presented with enough evidence, and I hope no one is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty. But let us allow the Rogue Trader to say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this enquiry."

traits.locale_text: « La cour a accumulé suffisamment de preuves et j'ose espérer que plus personne ne doute de la culpabilité de la dynastie von Valancius. Mais laissons {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} le mot de la fin. Nous sommes tous curieux de connaître les enseignements que vous avez tirés de cet interrogatoire. »

languages.text: “法庭已经得到了足够的证据，希望没有人再对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的罪行存在任何怀疑。不过，我们让行商浪人最后说一句话吧。我们所有人都想知道，你从这场审判中明白了哪些事情。”
languages.original_text: "The court has been presented with enough evidence, and I hope no one is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty. But let us allow the Rogue Trader to say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this enquiry."

traits.locale_text: “法庭已经得到了足够的证据，希望没有人再对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的罪行存在任何怀疑。不过，我们让行商浪人最后说一句话吧。我们所有人都想知道，你从这场审判中明白了哪些事情。”

languages.text: 「本法廷においては十分な証拠が提示され、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の罪について疑いを抱く者はもはやいないだろう。だがここで自由開拓者に最後の発言を許すとしよう。我々はみな、あなたがこの審問から何を得たのか知りたがっている」
languages.original_text: "The court has been presented with enough evidence, and I hope no one is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty. But let us allow the Rogue Trader to say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this enquiry."

traits.locale_text: 「本法廷においては十分な証拠が提示され、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の罪について疑いを抱く者はもはやいないだろう。だがここでローグトレーダーに最後の発言を許すとしよう。我々はみな、あなたがこの審問から何を得たのか知りたがっている」

languages.text: "Es wurden dem Gericht ausreichend Beweise vorgetragen, und ich hoffe, dass niemand mehr an der Schuld der Dynastie von Valancius zweifelt. Aber überlassen wir doch {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} das letzte Wort. Wir sind alle extrem neugierig, was Ihr bei dieser Ermittlung herausgefunden habt."
languages.original_text: "The court has been presented with enough evidence, and I hope no one is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty. But let us allow the Rogue Trader to say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this enquiry."

traits.locale_text: "Es wurden dem Hof ausreichend Beweise vorgetragen und ich hoffe, dass niemand mehr Zweifel hat bezüglich der Schuld der Dynastie von Valancius. Aber überlassen wir doch {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} das letzte Wort. Wir sind alle extrem neugierig, was Ihr bei dieser Ermittlung herausgefunden habt."

languages.text: «El tribunal dispone de pruebas suficientes, y confío en que nadie albergue ninguna duda sobre la culpabilidad de la dinastía von Valancius. Pero dejemos que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente presente su alegato final. Tenemos mucha curiosidad por saber qué opina del último testimonio».
languages.original_text: "The court has been presented with enough evidence, and I hope no one is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty. But let us allow the Rogue Trader to say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this enquiry."

traits.locale_text: «El tribunal dispone de pruebas suficientes, y confío en que nadie albergue ninguna duda sobre la culpabilidad de la dinastía Von Valancius. Pero dejemos que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente presente su alegato final. Tenemos mucha curiosidad por saber qué opina del último testimonio».

languages.text: "Divana yeterince kanıt sunuldu. Umarım hiç kimsenin içinde von Valancius hanedanlığının suçlu olduğuna dair bir şüphe kalmamıştır. Yine de Hür Tacir'den son sözlerini alalım. Bu sorgulamadan çıkardığı sonuçları duymayı hepimiz merakla bekliyoruz."
languages.original_text: "The court has been presented with enough evidence, and I hope no one is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty. But let us allow the Rogue Trader to say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this enquiry."

traits.locale_text: "Divana yeterince kanıt sunuldu ve umarım hiç kimsenin içinde von Valancius hanedanlığının suçlu olduğuna dair bir şüphe kalmamıştır. Hür Tacir'den son sözlerini alalım ama. Bu sorgulamadan çıkardığı sonuçları duymayı hepimiz merakla bekliyoruz."
